title: Path Talk
summary: Path Talk is smart, private messaging.

description: Path Talk is smart, private messaging. Message friends and family with photos, videos, TV shows, voice, music, movies, maps, and more - 1:1 or in small groups - all private, all off the record, and deleted from our servers 24 hours after you send them.Key Features:- Real Privacy: Your messages with friends on Path Talk are OFF THE RECORD, and deleted from our servers 7 days after you send them. Your conversations in real life are not on the record, why should your messages be?- Smart Status: A revolution in keeping up with your friends and starting off every conversation in context. Your status automatically updates in the background to tell your friends when you're in transit, in the neighborhood, listening to music, or even low on battery.- Quality Stickers: We've hired some of the best artists in the world to imagine and create all-new fun, expressive characters. We’ve also partners with some of the world’s most beloved brands like Peanuts, South Park, Adventure Time, Transformers, and Ghostbusters (now celebrating its 30th anniversary!). Choose from 1000’s of Path Stickers when emoji just isn't enough.- Quick Replies: Save time by nudging a friend or acknowledging a message directly from your message list with just a swipe.- Groups: Create group messages which work cross-platform no matter which smartphone your friends are on.- Voice: Quickly send and receive high quality voice messages 1-on-1 with a friend or back and forth with a group of people.- Fast: Super fast no matter what network you are on - 4G, 3G, or WiFi.- Free: Messages 1:1 and in groups with friends are free.Special Android-Only Features- Android Wear: See all messages -- from maps, to stickers, to photo. Replies are quick and easy: select the checkmark to say "Got It" with one tap, or use voice-to-text to respond hands-free.
descriptionHTML:
Path Talk is smart, private messaging. Message friends and family with photos, videos, TV shows, voice, music, movies, maps, and more - 1:1 or in small groups - all private, all off the record, and deleted from our servers 24 hours after you send them.

Key Features:
- Real Privacy: Your messages with friends on Path Talk are OFF THE RECORD, and deleted from our servers 7 days after you send them. Your conversations in real life are not on the record, why should your messages be?
- Smart Status: A revolution in keeping up with your friends and starting off every conversation in context. Your status automatically updates in the background to tell your friends when you're in transit, in the neighborhood, listening to music, or even low on battery.
- Quality Stickers: We've hired some of the best artists in the world to imagine and create all-new fun, expressive characters. We’ve also partners with some of the world’s most beloved brands like Peanuts, South Park, Adventure Time, Transformers, and Ghostbusters (now celebrating its 30th anniversary!). Choose from 1000’s of Path Stickers when emoji just isn't enough.
- Quick Replies: Save time by nudging a friend or acknowledging a message directly from your message list with just a swipe.
- Groups: Create group messages which work cross-platform no matter which smartphone your friends are on.
- Voice: Quickly send and receive high quality voice messages 1-on-1 with a friend or back and forth with a group of people.
- Fast: Super fast no matter what network you are on - 4G, 3G, or WiFi.
- Free: Messages 1:1 and in groups with friends are free.

Special Android-Only Features
- Android Wear: See all messages -- from maps, to stickers, to photo. Replies are quick and easy: select the checkmark to say "Got It" with one tap, or use voice-to-text to respond hands-free.
comments: Loved it at first but doesn't work anymore I use this daily but two days ago it stopped working and I got no response from the Path support team. Enjoy your 1 star.
It's been a couple of days now where I cannot receive or send messages and all of my previous messages got deleted. In addition, this app was never fully compatible with Android system.

Needs update. Hey devs, please make an update about it because basically its broken. And its not just me who is experiencing it, thank you a lot! I know maintaining this app is not easy but you guys can do it. Anyway why would you be in the position if you can't, ciao!

Really bad !!! I e-mailed the support and haven't recievced a reply yet !!! When are you going to fix the problem? It's been 5 days now, I can't use any feature of this pointless app !!!!! And I have noticed that this lag only accures for Android users !! If there were less than one start I'd totally rate this app with it.
Its not pratical Why I have to install different apk. path and path talk

"It's beginning to look a lot like Facebook" (Don't be like Facebook) Please integrate this into the main app itself, so that i can access it by swiping right to left, or something like that. Don't want two apps, also bring features like floating chat heads (Facebook uses it but i think it would be a useful feature in any messaging app).
